msbt.message: Tonight's the Coooountdoooown! It's the last party of the year! So let's go ALL OUT!
Less than an hour until the new year! Ohmigosh! ! My heart is totes not prepared!
Wow, the year's almost over! How was your year, ?Mine was pretty fabtastic! Here's to next year being even MORE fun!
Only a little more time until the new year! You ready, ?
Wow, , you are ROCKING that party hat!Have to look fab for the final fiesta of the year, !
Don't I look AMAZ-TASTIC in this New Year's party hat, ?Little accessories like these are totes important for amping up the fun, you know?
You've got to dress up and look good for the Countdown!Are you ready, ? We still have time, so you should throw on your party hat!
What do you think of my party hat? Isn't it, like, perf for the Countdown?It's the last party of the year. Got to be fashionably FABTACULAR!
Ooh! Wow, ! Your accessorizing is on POINT! I've got to get in on that too!
Ohmigosh! You're one step ahead of me! I need to get ready toooo!
Alright, how do I look? I'm going for a style I call GlamFab! That's "Glamorously Fabtacular," B-T-dubs.
Ohmigosh! I forgot the MOST important thing for le Countdown!
Ohmigosh! I full-on spaced! Yikes, ! Got to keep your A game going!
Perf! Let's dress up and PAR-TAY into the new year, !

There's only 30 minutes left in the year! Have I forgotten to do anything?!Let me see I didn't get around to redecorating, organizing my closet, or catching the vampireI'm OUT OF TIME! I can't finish ANY of that stuff!
What kind of year do you want next year to be, ?I'm going to make my pop-star debut next year!I'm going to become famous! And tell the whole world about !
I'm SO excited for the Countdown! Everyone's staying up late tonight so we can all sleep in tomorrow!
You look like you're ready with your hat and all, !Ringing in the new year in style gets me SO exciiiiited, !
That party hat looks great on you! It's perf for tonight's Countdown!I look cute, right? I started EARLY on this look! Got to be EXTRA on point on EXTRA SPECIAL days!
LOOK AT MY HEAD! I got this to celebrate the new year!
The must-have fashion accessory for the Countdown? This party hat!Are you not into this fashion, ? Come on! Try it on!
My party hat! Ohmigosh! I almost forgot! I've got to get mine ready too!
Look at you, ! You're totes ready to party in that hat! I should get ready too!
Ta-daa! With this hat, my Countdown outfit is complete!
Oops! I forgot, like, THE most important part of my outfit!
Oh! I thought I was forgetting somethingmy party hat!That was close! I was about to be underdressed for the party!
So, , what do you say? Let's live it up in some officially licensed Countdown gear!
It's almost the new year! Eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee! I'm, I don't know, supes nervous?!
Almost the new year! Here's my resolutionThis year I'm going tothink about practicing, singing, and dancing EVERY. DAY.
I wonder what next year will be like? I hope it's even MORE fun than this year was!<10_10 />AND IT WAS A PRETTY GREAT YEAR ON THIS ISLAND!
This is it, ! You ready?<10_7 arg="120" />
Ahhh!!! It's almost the new year! I'm SO excited!<10_7 arg="120" />
This year I'm going to ring in the new year in peace and quiet indoors! Aren't I, like, sooo mature?
I suddenly have lots of things I want to do now that the year's almost over! That's why I started cleaning!I've, you knowbeen putting this off since LAST New Year's Eve
I'm SO excited for my first dream of the year!<10_4 /> It's going to be me, in the spotlight, singing for a full stadium
I've always wanted to go to a pre-Countdown live concert!Where fireworks fire off on zero and everyone yells "Happy New Yeâ€”" HEY! THEY DO THAT IN THE PLAZA!
No time to sleep tonight! Have to SCREAM in the new year!<10_10 />HAAAAAPPY NEW YEEEEEEAR!
Yaaay! ! You came to see me before the new year! Fabtastic!
Only a little bit left in the year! Makes you reflect on the year, huh
It's almost time for the Countdown! The new year is SO. EXCITING!
Almost the new year! I'm really looking forward to a fresh start! Maybe a makeover!New year, new ! And probs a new album by fall, if I start thinking album covers now!
Less than a minute left! Here comes the new year!<10_7 arg="120" />
Almost time, ! Let's have even more fun next year!<10_7 arg="120" />
It's finally the new year! It's SO EXCITING, !
The fireworks are sooo pretty! I'm getting, like, moved here!I hope I'M that inspiring one day, !
Do you have a resolution already, ?Mine is to make it big and EXPLODE all over , just like those fireworks!
Weird how it doesn't FEEL like the year's changed, huh?I can't believe I was so anxious just a sec ago, !
What should I do this year? sounds fun! Ooh, or !I'm going to expand my horizons! I want to be the most talented pop star ever in the history of ever!
Huh? Are you sleepy? Don't be sleepy, !Be like me! Wide awake! Ready to paryaaawn. Ah! No wait, that didn't happen! I want to celebrate!
New Year's Day has so much good food going on, I always end up eating too much
I want to try something new this year! What should it be?I could take up . That'd be fab. Or learn to make , maybe?
Ohmigosh! I can hear the fireworks! That sound gets me so excited! It's like a sweet drum solo in a song!
It's a new year, ! But you're still welcome at my place anytime!

If you have something to give to me, now's your chance!What do you mean what do I mean?It's New Year's! You promised to give me a new umbrella! A sparkly one that smells like lilacsHA! KIDDING! KIDDING! You should have SEEN the look on your face!
Hanging with first thing in the year! Yay!I'm, like, SO happy right now! Where I am, who I'm with! This year's going to be THE BEST!
Awww! The fireworks are over! BUT THE NIGHT'S NOT OVER!I am going to play video games ALL NIGHT! At least until I fall asleep on the floooooor!
You know how they say it's better if you plan for the year on New Year's Day?My plan for this year is to make my pop-star debut, obvs! And then? I'm going to teach the world my name!Perfect! Right, ?
How you doing, ? I'm SO hyper! I drank a bunch of coffee so I could stay up really late It worked. But it's the worst.<10_4 /> I'm not sleepy, I'm wabbawowza.<10_4 /> REALLY, REALLY wabbawowza!
Kicking off by hanging with my bestie! That's you, B-T-dubs. Let's make legit top the charts!
